name: Vaulta
description:
Point-and-click adventure 3D puzzle game. Explore an island full of mystery and story to uncover. Find a way off of the island by completing the many puzzles located on it

Inspired by the Myst series, this technical prototype sees the point-and-click puzzle genre set in a 3D environment, made in Unreal Engine 4.

Mechanics, island landscape, UI/graphics, puzzle models and audio made by me. Quixel Megascans assets were used for foliage, trees, rocks and terrain textures (grass, rock, sand and wood).
